pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyDload [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/pydload)](https://pepy.tech/project/pydload)# Installation```pip install pydload```Documentation at http://bpraneeth.com/docs/pydload/# Usage```python# As a python moduleimport pydloadpydload.dload('url')``````bash# As a cli toolpydload url_to_download```# Optional Paramsmax_time - default:30sec. If download takes more than max_time stop download.timeout - default:10sec. Requests timeout. Max time allowed for establishing connection.
